page.title: 04BACUP FOOTBALL LEAGUE
page.content:
My name is Scott and I am writing about the Bacup and District Amateur Football League. There are ten teams in the League. They are the Little Queen, White Horse'A', The Gale, Royal Oak,St.Joseph's St.Marys,White Horse 'B',Road Express,Suttons and Black Bull.The Little Queen is a pub,the White Horse 'A' is a pub,the Gale is a pub,the Royal Oak is also a pub.
St. Joseph's is a Church and St.Marys is a Church White Horse 'B' is a pub. Road Express is a Work's team Suttons is a work's team and the Black Bull is a pub.
There are many more football teams, but the best play in the Burnley League because the pitches are better.
